data.title: Dgraph | Open Source, AI-Ready Graph Database
data.description: The only open source, AI-ready graph database that gives developers the tools to quickly build distributed applications at scale.
data.content:
Dgraph | Open Source, AI-Ready Graph Database
===============
  

[**The future of Dgraph is open, serverless, and AI-ready** →](https://hypermode.com/blog/the-future-of-dgraph-is-open-serverless-and-ai-ready?utm_source=dgraph&utm_medium=banner&utm_campaign=dgraphbanner)

[![Image 1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fa3e9d303f20f698270a7a/6634fe57b4ce744214616951_DgraphByHypermode_light.svg)](https://dgraph.io/)

Join those who left JOINs behind
================================

The only open source, AI-ready graph database

[Start Free](https://cloud.dgraph.io/pricing?type=free)

![Image 9](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fa3e9d303f20f698270a7a/640e3aab44ffd00dc9b4081e_Rectangle%202168%20(1).png)

![Image 10](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fa3e9d303f20f698270a7a/640e3e45e1340eb1389abfe6_Group%2027099.svg)

Loved by data engineers & developers
------------------------------------

Alex Ridden

CEO, Knights Analytics

“Dgraph has allowed us to develop functionality which would have been significantly more challenging or impossible with other databases.”

Dimy Jeannot

CTO,  SAFE Health Systems, Inc.

“If you need a horizontally scalable, price-scalable, modern, AND distributed Knowledge Graph supported by a team of passionate artisans, look no further than Dgraph!”

Suhabe Bugrara

CTO, State Space, Inc.

“Dgraph's low latency and scalability has enabled us to quickly build a complex, reliable, enterprise-grade product with minimal engineering resources.”

Rob Keevil

CTO, Knights Analytics

“Dgraph's industry-leading performance and powerful ability to scale makes it the clear graph database choice for high volume, performance-sensitive enterprise environments.”

Rachit Bhargava

Connect America

“If you want customer 360 implementations you use Dgraph”

John Zhou

Senior Engineering Manager, Lifeline (former Philips Lifeline)

“The overall performance of Dgraph is amazing, especially the great support team in Dgraph is really hands-on and ready to support us at any time.”

CTO, Knights Analytics

“Dgraph's industry-leading performance and powerful ability to scale makes it the clear graph database choice for high volume, performance-sensitive enterprise environments.”

20K GITHUB STARS & GROWING

The Modern Graph Database
-------------------------

A fault-tolerant, distributed graph database, that gives developers the tools to rapidly build applications that scale

![Image 11](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fa3e9d303f20f698270a7a/640e50030ded73b023a008dd_Union.svg)![Image 12](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fa3e9d303f20f698270a7a/641a0387bd2ff6b621d3fec7_Union.svg)

### Easy to Use

Query the way you want. Use GraphQL for speed and simplicity or express more complex patterns with DQL.

[Learn More](https://dgraph.io/product#easy-to-use)

### Highly Performant

Massively parallelized query engine means low latency and high throughput.

[Learn More](https://dgraph.io/product#high-performant)

### Limitless Scalability

Horizontally scale both reads and writes across as many nodes as you need. Shards automatically rebalance as data density shifts.

[Learn More](https://dgraph.io/product#limitless-scale)

Why Dgraph?

Graphs are the most natural way to access the data that matters.
----------------------------------------------------------------

### Other vendors

Requires middle tier for business logic

Poor consistency across shards

Limited scalability

Limited joins & query complexity

Asynchronous replication

![Image 13](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fa3e9d303f20f698270a7a/64113d298eb162638ae4ae63_Frame%206671.svg)

### The Dgraph Way

GraphQL Native

Any query can become an endpoint

Consistency across shards by default

Scale-out native architecture

Unlimited joins without performance impact

Synchronous replication

![Image 14](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fa3e9d303f20f698270a7a/64221230a31e9eaba52f32df_Frame%206671%20(6).svg)

![Image 15](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fa3e9d303f20f698270a7a/64113e063b3a842a721e2f2a_Vector.svg)

Learn how to build with Dgraph
==============================

To immediately see what Dgraph is about, check out the GraphQL and/or DQL tour.

[Take the tour](https://dgraph.io/tour/)

![Image 16](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fa3e9d303f20f698270a7a/641142227f602e37fd528e9d_Frame%2031774.svg)

![Image 17](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fa3e9d303f20f698270a7a/641140e28fed60dc689e8a4e_unsplash_FQe4hjBlcPE%20(1).jpg)

Dgraph Use Cases

Modern Applications are Built on  
Graphs
-----------------------------------------

**Graphs** are a data model designed to answer how **this** is related to **that** in real time.

![Image 18: Knowledge Graphs](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fa3e9d303f20f698270a7a/63ff8f54b66dbeca7cfca853_material-symbols_chart-data-outline.svg)

Firebase Alternative
====================

Build an entire application with your app server and database with one seamless API.  
  
Eliminate the need for data mapping back and forth from GraphQL to the database schema.  Get better performance, greater scalability, and simpler maintenance.

[Learn more](https://dgraph.io/solutions/rapid-application-development)

![Image 19: Recommendation Engine](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fa3e9d303f20f698270a7a/63ff9052c2c0882264e28451_material-symbols_app-registration.svg)

Recommendation Engine
=====================

Easily build two-tower, collaborative filtering-based, or KNN recommendation systems.  
  
Store computed similarity as additional knowledge in the graph for an efficient real-time recommendation engine.

[Learn more](https://dgraph.io/solutions/recommendation-engine)

![Image 20: Entity Resolution](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fa3e9d303f20f698270a7a/63ff9073fde37e79d29679ed_material-symbols_auto-graph.svg)

Master Data Management
======================

Identify and match real-world entities in unstructured data sources. Dgraph’s ability to store, link, and traverse nodes enables data standardization, duplicate detection, and data merging.  
  
Clean data is at the heart of any application.

[Learn more](https://dgraph.io/solutions/entity-resolution)

![Image 21: Rapid Application Development](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fa3e9d303f20f698270a7a/63ff90a1746bce527eb047cd_Fast%20(5).svg)

Knowledge Graphs  

===================

Represent knowledge as a network of entities and their relationships. By materializing the relationships between entities, it creates critical context for AI.  
  
When building with LLMs, a knowledge graph increases performance, response accuracy, and improves explainability.

[Learn more](https://dgraph.io/solutions/knowledge-graphs)

![Image 22: Customer Ordering Journey](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fa3e9d303f20f698270a7a/63ff90b70292aa0e2f71fe1c_money-square.svg)

Customer 360
============

Understand how your buyers go from intent to purchase.  
  
By modeling the inputs of your customer journey-- retailers can create a personalized experience for each buyer.  
  
Implement real-time product recommendations and promotions.

[Learn more](https://dgraph.io/solutions/customer-ordering-journey)

![Image 23: Process Monitoring](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fa3e9d303f20f698270a7a/63ff90d40292aa287672005a_hand-brake.svg)

Fraud Detection
===============

Detect complex fraud involving multiple entities and accounts with Dgraph.    
  
Unlike databases that rely on JOINs, Dgraph enables the analysis of large connected data sets to identify crucial relationships and patterns, resulting in more accurate and effective fraud detection.

[Learn more](https://dgraph.io/solutions/business-processing-monitoring)

Join the Community
------------------

Our mission is to help developers and organizations leverage the power of Graphs to build **incredible** applications faster and more easily.

![Image 24](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fa3e9d303f20f698270a7a/63fd0b0cf8555a5f96128aed_Query%20icon.svg)

### 100 Billion+

Queries on Dgraph

![Image 25](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fa3e9d303f20f698270a7a/63fd0b696bcd8a95f89d1521_Open%20source%20icon.svg)

Open Source Graph Database

Latest from our blog
--------------------

[Read More](https://dgraph.io/blog/)

[![Image 32](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fa3e9d303f20f698270a7a/66b4adef9a7a67a4ee3cfec4_lemon.png) ### Product recommendation using RAG on Dgraph In this blog post, we will use Dgraph database to store retail products information (Amazon products data) and Language Models to reply to users asking for a product recommendation. The blog post provides Python code snippets to explain the main steps. The complete Jupyter Notebook and associated data folder are available for you to play with. Learn more ![Image 33](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fa3e9d303f20f698270a7a/63fe2acb611cc14dc9f8231a_Union%20(12).svg)](https://dgraph.io/blog/post/20240724_rag_on_graph/)[![Image 34](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fa3e9d303f20f698270a7a/6452902a7b906dac6622b3da_rad.webp) ### Rapid application development with Dgraph data platform This blog post reviews the steps needed to rapidly set up a GraphQL-based application factory. The instructions and sample code cover how to model and think about the data, set up the Dgraph database for GraphQL storage and API access, load data, and integrate it into React components to build a web app. Learn more ![Image 35](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fa3e9d303f20f698270a7a/63fe2acb611cc14dc9f8231a_Union%20(12).svg)](https://dgraph.io/blog/post/rapid-app-dev/)

No items found.

Get Started Today!
------------------

Dgraph gives you the scalability and performance you need with the pricing and transparency you expect. Start building today with the world’s most advanced and performant graph database.

[Start Free](https://cloud.dgraph.io/pricing?type=free&zo=us-east-1)[See Pricing Plans](https://dgraph.io/pricing)
